name: Nurture Intense Hydration Hair Mask
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Masks
about: What it is: A richly moisturizing hair mask infused with JVN‚Äôs unique triple hydration system for up to 72 hours of instant hydration after a single use...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Frizz.- Damage, Split Ends, and Breakage..Key Benefits:.- 72 hours of instant hydration.- Leaves hair 15x easier to comb.- Smooths frizz and split ends..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Keratris: A vegan keratin alternative that provides hydration and frizz control..- Hemisqualane: A silicone alternative that improves hair health and strength..- Amino Acids: Smooth hair cuticle for a silkier feel and reduce the look of split ends...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Deeply infuse moisture to transform dry hair and nourish split ends for your softest strands, thanks to a first-of-its-kind triple hydration system powered by hemisqualane, amino acids, and groundbreaking keratris‚ÄîJVN‚Äôs high-performance, vegan keratin alternative, sourced from upcycled orange...Fragrance Description: An accord of amber woods and musk brings luminous warmth to a blend of balmy summer flowers, rounded by touches of crisp apple and violet leaf...Clinical Results: Based on a 21-day consumer study of 35 subjects used once per week:.- 100% said hair felt more nourished and hydrated.- 97% saw less breakage and a reduction in the appearance of split ends.Instantly hydrates & retains moisture for upto 72 hours after one use*.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Keratris: A vegan keratin alternative that provides hydration and frizz control..-Hemisqualane: A silicone alternative that improves hair health and strength..-Amino Acids: Smooth hair cuticle for a silkier feel and reduce the look of split ends...Water/Aqua/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Squalane, Hydrogenated Farnesene*, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Cetyl Esters, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Diheptyl Succinate, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Behentrimonium Chloride, Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil, Panthenol, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Lactic Acid, Tocopherol, Sodium Gluconate, Lactobacillus Ferment, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Benzyl Alcohol, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance/Parfum, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool..*Sugarcane Derived Hemisqualane...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After shampooing with your fave JVN shampoo, apply to mid lengths and ends. .-Leave on for three to five minutes and rinse. .-Use in place of conditioner weekly or as needed...JVN tip: .-Use a wide tooth comb in the shower after applying to more evenly disperse the mask through your hair...Recycling Instructions:.-Please refer to your local recycling center for guidance on how to recycle.                                                                                                                                                                                        -Aluminum jar and lid: 100 percent infinitely recyclable..-Dust cap: HDPE..-Outer packaging: FSC-certified with soy-based ink.

reviews.review_title: My new favourite for soft, shiny hair!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm honestly surprised to see all the negative reviews on this product, I loved it and my review is not incentivized! I've been on a perimenopausal change in hair texture (I used to have silky, fine hair that has become much drier and wirier) and density journey, and I've been trying every moisturizing or deep conditioning product I can get my hands on! I have been a Briogeo girl for a while now, but I tried this product on a whim and it is my new favourite!! My hair felt softer and looked shinier after using this, and I also appreciate the mild, more natural scent. Of course, everyone's hair is different, but based on my experience, this product is definitely worth a try if you're dealing with similar hair concerns!

reviews.review_text: Awful‚Ä¶ just awful! I don‚Äôt care what hair texture you have, I don‚Äôt see how this stuff could provide any moisture to your hair at all. The texture of the product is super weird and almost has a drying effect (the complete opposite of moisturizing). The best way I can describe it is like dish liquid, after you scrub a glass and get it literally squeaky clean, that‚Äôs how your fingers feel when you rub them together with this product on them. It provides ZERO slip, your hairs screech apart and snap when you part your hair. It caused my hair to become a tangled mess and dried it out even more. I don‚Äôt recommend this junk to ANYONE, especially not to people with textured or curly hair and certainly not for those with dry hair, God forbid you compound the problem with this crap. Incentivized reviews are destroying quality control and manufacturer accountability in this country!

No slip at all and I was losing a lot of hair.  ‚Ä¢When I used this intense mask, I ended up layering MELANIN‚Äôs conditioner on top for maximum hydration. I sat under the dryer for 35 minutes and had such soft hair. Everything I did, I had to use something else behind it. Sucks.   I do recommend this but only to straighter textures, not textures that NEED actual moisture.

reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a hair mask that will transform your dry and damaged locks into a luscious and hydrated mane, look no further than the JVN Nurture Intense Hydration Hair Mask. As someone who has struggled with dry and brittle hair, this mask has been an absolute game-changer in my hair care routine.  From the very first use, I noticed a significant improvement in the texture and overall health of my hair. The mask's rich and creamy formula coats each strand, providing deep hydration and nourishment from root to tip. The combination of powerful ingredients, such as argan oil, shea butter, and coconut oil, work together to penetrate deeply into the hair shaft, replenishing moisture and restoring vitality.  What sets the JVN Nurture Intense Hydration Hair Mask apart is its ability to deliver long-lasting results. After rinsing out the mask, my hair felt incredibly soft, silky, and manageable. Even after days of styling and exposure to environmental stressors, my hair maintained its newfound hydration and shine. No more frizz or dryness to worry about!  The versatility of this mask is another aspect I truly appreciate. While it's recommended to leave it on for 5-10 minutes, I often opt for a longer treatment by wrapping my hair in a warm towel to allow the mask to deeply penetrate my strands. Whether you have a few spare minutes or want to indulge in a self-care session, this mask can be tailored to fit your needs.  I must also mention the delightful scent of this hair mask. The subtle floral and coconut notes create a luxurious and pampering experience each time I use it. It's a small detail, but one that adds to the overall enjoyment of the product.  Lastly, I appreciate that the JVN Nurture Intense Hydration Hair Mask is free from sulfates, parabens, and harsh chemicals. As someone who prioritizes clean beauty, it's reassuring to know that I'm treating my hair to a product that is both effective and gentle.

It was like the tangles and knots were just melting away with each comb stroke. I felt like it was a dream come true for my curly hair since it often gets tangled.   The transformation was truly remarkable. It felt so much smoother, and the frizziness was significantly reduced. My curls looked more defined and bouncy, and the overall shine was incredible. My hair went from being dull, dry, and brittle to feeling soft, healthy, and hydrated. The results were immediate.  Comparing my hair before and after using the product, the difference was night and day. Before, my hair lacked life and vitality, but after using the JVN Nurture Intense Hydration Mask, it was like my hair had been rejuvenated. I noticed a significant improvement in the texture and look of my hair from the first use itself.  What impressed me the most was how fast and easy it was to use this mask. I like that it didn't require a long waiting time nor was it complicated. This product truly stands out because it delivers on its promises. reviews.review_title: Glorified Review for JVNHair's Nurture Intense Hyd
reviews.review_text: Let me tell you about the amazing transformation my hair underwent with JVNHair's Nurture Intense Hydration Mask! I've struggled with dry and lifeless hair for a long time, but this product turned my hair care routine around and gave me the hair of my dreams.  From the start, I was impressed with JVNHair's attention to detail, evident from the moment I received the package. The packaging was not only visually appealing but also practical, ensuring the product arrived in perfect condition. As I opened the jar, a refreshing and invigorating scent greeted me, immediately igniting my excitement to try it out.  The Nurture Intense Hydration Mask itself is a luxurious, creamy formula that glided effortlessly through my hair. Following the instructions, I applied it after shampooing, and to my surprise, the mask instantly melted into my hair, delivering an instant burst of hydration. What impressed me the most was that it didn't weigh my hair down or make it greasy, something I had worried about with other hair masks.  As I let the magic happen, I noticed a wonderful lightness in my hair, a feeling I hadn't experienced in a long time. The nourishing blend of ingredients seemed to work wonders, leaving my strands looking healthier and feeling incredibly soft.  After the recommended time, I rinsed out the mask, and the results were nothing short of astounding! My hair felt like pure silk, and the hydration was unlike anything I had ever experienced. The mask had penetrated deep into each strand, visibly revitalizing my hair with a newfound shine and bounce that I thought was lost forever.  What truly set JVNHair's Nurture Intense Hydration Mask apart was its long-lasting effects. Even after multiple washes, my hair retained the nourishment and moisture, staying manageable and frizz-free. I also noticed a significant reduction in split ends, a clear sign of the mask's ability to repair and strengthen damaged hair.

I also appreciated that the effects of the mask lasted for several days, meaning I didn't have to use it as frequently as some other products I've tried.  Another aspect that impressed me was the packaging. The JVN Nurture Intense Hydration Hair Mask comes in a sturdy and attractive container, making it easy to store and travel with. The instructions on the label were clear and concise, ensuring that I used the product correctly and got the most out of it.  Overall, I wholeheartedly recommend the JVN Nurture Intense Hydration Hair Mask to anyone in need of a boost in hair hydration. With its nourishing formula, delightful scent, and visible results, it has become a staple in my hair care routine. Thanks to this hair mask, my locks have never looked or felt better.
